    How to creating a front page

    my problem is this - i have finished installing and setting up accounts, however, i dont want to see the login page as the first page, I want to create a front page and have the login page linked to that. ...and another problem when i scroll up and down the name/title of the site/page would berak-up or sometimes disappear. any ideas

  • 2007-12-10 01:01:16

    Re: How to creating a front page

    Just create a index.html with the content you want an put it to the root of ATutor.
    Most Webservers using first the index.html and then the index.php
    I think that is the most simple way.
